properties.address: Haverhill Arts Centre, High Street, Haverhill CB9 8AR, UK
properties.description: Keep warm this winter! Thanks to funding from West Suffolk council, we are hosting a series of FREE craft Saturdays throughout January and February to make some unique artwork with everyday items. Each workshop will run from 11:00am – 2:30pm. Visitors will also receive a free hot drink and biscuits. No need to book, just drop in! Saturday 20 January – create monster peg pets, with the Crafty Foxes Join the crafty foxes and make some cute monster peg pets with pens, wool, paint and googly eyes. Saturday 27 January – dandylion art, with the Crafty Foxes The crafty foxes will help you create your own dandylion artwork on black sugar paper using white paint and cardboard tubes. Saturday 3 February – details TBC, with the Fabric Seagull Saturday 10 February – details TBC, with the Fabric Seagull Saturday 17 February – shrinky dink keyrings, with the Crafty Foxes Wanted to make your own keyrings using special shrinking paper? Freestyle your own design or use crafty foxes templates to make funky key chains. Saturday 24 February – crazy labyrinth puzzles, with the Crafty Foxes Recycle old CD cases to make your own 3D labyrinth maze puzzle.
properties.title: Winter Warmers -Free Craft Workshops
